TrEd Extension: pmltq (version 1.9)

PML Tree Query Interface for TrEd

(generated documentation)

Description:

Provides graphical interface for PML-TQ, which is a system for querying over treebanks or local files with a powerful query language.

Documentation

PML-TQ query language and tools (including this TrEd GUI) will be described in

  • PML Tree Query Guide (incomplete, but work in progress)

Quick start

Press Shift+F3 or using Macros -> Tree_Query -> *Start Tree Query.

TrEd macro files:

  • pmltq/contrib.mac
  • pmltq/icons
  • pmltq/ng.inc
  • pmltq/obsolete.inc
  • pmltq/Tree_Query
  • pmltq/tree_query_btred.mak
  • pmltq/tree_query_http.mak
  • pmltq/tree_query.mak
  • pmltq/tree_query_sql.mak

Resource files:

  • tree_query_schema.xml
